plot: Mr. Canoga hires Paula Wentworth to date and seduce politicians with private detective Nick King taping it. Paula moves on from Senator Duncan to Mr. Howard and his assistant Miss June and finally to Washington wife, Mrs. White.
title: Blow-Off!
plot_es: Mr. Canoga hires Paula Wentworth to date and seduce politicians with private detective Nick King taping it. Paula moves on from Senator Duncan to Mr. Howard and his assistant Miss June and finally to Washington wife, Mrs. White.
plot_en: Mr. Canoga hires Paula Wentworth to date and seduce politicians with private detective Nick King taping it. Paula moves on from Senator Duncan to Mr. Howard and his assistant Miss June and finally to Washington wife, Mrs. White.
